title: Correction to: Prevention of Infections in Cardiac Surgery study (PICS): study protocol for a pragmatic cluster-randomized factorial crossover pilot trial.
abstract: Following publication of the original article [1], we have been notified of a few mistakes in the "Sample size calculations" section, second paragraph.
